MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Aberlady. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:00pm due to a faulty transformer near Kilspindie Golf Club and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00pm on Monday, 15 March 2021
